image.altText: David smiles talking to two people.

image.altText: A woman with blonde hair and black top stands in front of a Telstra phone box in Narooma.

image.altText: Old photo of Edith Cowan, she is not smiling or looking at camera. She wears a dark dress and a white neck piece.

image.altText: A woman lying down with a newborn swaddled beside her.

image.altText: Isabel Allende smizes as she perches over a door frame while wearing a black top, her short hair bleached and styled in waves.

props.synopsis: More than 40 years after the release of her first novel, the best-selling Chilean-American author reflects on the reason she is drawn to stories that blend the mundane with the extraordinary.
